content.rendered:
• Our Focus
Estate Planning
Elder Law
Divorce & Family Law
Real Estate Law
Probate
Guardianship

Here For You & Your Family

Our Client Testimonials & Reviews

— Jessica M.

All I can say is Bruno is amazing. Losing my mom and handling her her estate has not been easy but I don’t know how I would have done it without Frank. His kindness and knowledge has helped me throughout this whole process. He always returned my calls and answered all my questions with my best interest in mind. I highly recommend his services!

— Peter C.

is attorney and office made the legal part of buying a home simple and fast. Bruno Reyes Jr and his staff were excellent in returning my calls, answering my hundreds of questions (first time home owner), and guiding me through the entire way to my closing. My wife and I recommend this office to anyone out there in need of Bruno Reyes’s services. Thank you again for the excellent service Bruno and staff!!

— Kenya

I am a divorced since 2007 and my ex-husband was ordered to pay $25 per month child support for my 2 sons. My ex-husband resides in another state and was in violation for paying child support for 10+years. My attempts throughout the years to get a modification failed. This all changed after I retained attorney Sebastian Karczmarczyk. He took my case and handled it with great professionalism all while being sympathetic to my specific needs. Sebastian made sure to review my case and left no stone unturned. He fought diligently in the courtroom all while securing my integrity. Sebastian kept me abreast of every court appearance, every legal obstacle, every legal notice etc. He was able to get my ex-husband to appear in court and ultimately Sebastian got a settlement for my sons which I am very satisfied. I cannot thank Sebastian enough for going above & beyond the legal call of duty for my family.

— D.J

I initially came to the office for a child support matter. We went to court and the attorney helped me resolve the matter so that I wouldn’t have to pay! They took the time to explain the process to me so that I understood what was going on. I feel that they represented me well and resolved my issues. I have recommended the office to two friends already and will continue to recommend them to more. If it weren’t for this office I’d still be making child support payments.

— D.B

I went to the office with the matter of getting visitation rights to visit my grandchildren. We went to court a few times before I ended up deciding to drop the case. However, Sebastian was a great attorney. He was very prepared with all the paperwork. He was very thorough and asked all the right questions. He was also very focused on the case. He did a great job. I would absolutely recommend this office to my friends and family!

— Joe

I have used Mr. Bruno for several legal matters. He has always done a great job and I highly recommend him.

— Krzysztof W.

It was a pleasure to work with Bruno Reyes Jr Law Office. Sebastian helped us with every question we had. Very nice people and definitely recommending this Law Firm.

— H. S.

really helped me with all my family law and custody issues. I felt very comfortable with The whole process. Hes extremely knowledgeable, professional, and prompt.

— E.G

I chose this office because the reviews were great and they did not disappoint. I went to the office with a paternity proceeding. We went to court a few times and the attorney was able to get me what I wanted, which was a paternity test and to be acknowledged as my child’s father. I would definitely recommend this office to friends and family.

— Nison

Most reliable, kind and restpected by judges attorney. All aspects of my case was answered and filed in timely and profetional manner. God Bless!

— J.P.

I went to the office for my mother and father’s estate and to sell my house. The process for both went very good and smoothly. I especially enjoyed working with Sebastian. He answered all of my calls and would get back to me really quickly when I asked questions. He was also very good at explaining everything! Would definitely recommend the office to family and friends.

— E.R.

I had the pleasure of attending one of Mr. Bruno’s seminars on estate planning. He was very informative, patient, and accommodating with the crowd. He took time to answer all questions and made sure everyone in the room understood. He is a great presenter, I felt that he took a personal interest in his work. After the seminar, I was able to book a free in-office consultation to further discuss my options. He was just as helpful, informative, and patient as he had been at the seminar. He took all the time I needed to help me with my questions. I am very pleased with Mr. Bruno and will be returning for more advice and will be recommending him to all my friends.

— J.S.

I went to the office because I was getting divorced from my wife. Everything went very well and smoothly. We did not have to go to court which was great. I really liked this office because they showed that they cared and were very attentive. I did not have to wait hours unlike in other offices. I would definitely recommend this office to friends and family.

— Fred S.

The law firm was professional, courteous, and effective. I would recommend to others

— J.C.

I went to the office to get divorced and for a bankruptcy case. The outcomes for both were very good. I did not have to go to court for the divorce but did go to court for the bankruptcy. Everyone in the office was very pleasant, informative and answered all of my questions. I would recommend the office to family and friends!

— Dawnmarie

Bruno Reyes is a very efficient lawyer. Mr. Bruno is knowledgeable in many areas of law. He has helped me with multiple situations in a caring professional manner. One of his many great qualities is his ability to help find a solution for his clients’ situations in a comforting manner.

— Maribel S.

I came to the office for a guardianship. Mr. Bruno helped me become guardian of my aunt. I appreciate that he took time to explain all the confusing terminology and made sure I understood every step of the way. The lawyers were helpful and always available for me. I would absolutely recommend them!

— Robert D.

I came into the office for legal advice. My former landlord was selling the house and has asked me to do some repairs. After I completed them he refused to give me my security deposit. The lawyer I spoke to gave me a free consultation and guided me in the right direction. I was able to walk away satisfied I had made the right choice. I would definitely recommend the office to friends and family, they were honest and straightforward and weren’t looking to waste my time.

— Cindy C.

Bruno Reyes helped me through one of the hardest times I ever went through. He is very informative and takes his time with you. He definitely knows what he is doing and he took the time to answer all my questions. I highly recommend him..

— Joseph L.

I came to the office because I was buying a house. Bruno helped me purchase my property. He was very smart, knowledgeable and family oriented. He took time to explain everything to me making a stressful, scary situation calm and putting me at ease. I have recommended the office to friends who have become clients and will continue to recommend them. I have even returned myself.

— Richard S.

Coronavirus has made all business transactions more difficult but Bruno has made every effort to reach out and conduct business in a professional manner. Bruno is knowledgeable, friendly, easy to talk to and a GREAT listener. So far, I find Bruno and his staff to be helpful, professional and extremely fair.

— Kay M.

Bruno Reyes is an amazing attorney. Him & his staff are remarkable. Always there for my family. Very understanding patient & professional . I would recommend Bruno & his staff for all of your legal needs

— Valeria R.

This is the first review i have ever written I like to read reviews but never write them BUT Mr.Bruno and his staff made purchasing a home for the first time so easy I felt the need to write this review. When my husband and I initially walked in we were greeted by Dina whom instantly made us feel like we were in the right place and after meeting with Mr.Bruno it was confirmed. He explained the entire home buying process step by step patiently(because i was very nervous) we went over the contract carefully and he addressed any concerns my husband and I had. He also contacted the sellers attorney making sure all of our requests were met by the seller in a timely manner. From beginning to end the entire process was so fast we were home buyers in no time. I must say when others complain about the home buying experience I cannot agree because i had such a great experience. I have even referred him to friends and family whom are also extremely happy with the services provided!

— Nick D.

Bruno Reyes Jr Attorney’s office was amazing. Great Professionalism and Assistance. All my questions promptly answered and they go even way beyond to protect your interests as a client. A special mention to Dina…simply wonderful. She’ll clearly explain all the details of each step. I highly recommend them.

— S. Family

I just want to thank you for all the care and thought you have put into my son Kevin’s case. I want you to know our family is very greatful to have met a lawyer like yourself. I wish you the best in everything you do. May you and your family stay healthy.

— Paresh F.

Mr Bruno from The Law Offices of Bruno Reyes Jr., during my free initial consultation, reviewed the documents shared by me, discussed and suggested corrective actions that can be taken to address my situation. His guidance is of great help to me.

— Veronica C.

My grandmother and I went to Mr. Bruno office and it was a pleasant experience. He was very clear and made sure we understood everything he for us and his staff was equally nice. Thank you Mr. Bruno and staff

— Richard R.

The law office of Bruno Reyes was accommodating in assisting me with my legal matters. Always clear and informative. Thank you!

— Mary B.

Great experience overall having attorney Bruno Reyes located in Glendale, NY give me a no cost consultation. Mr. Bruno was so professional in telling me exactly what I needed to know regarding Power of Attorney for my aging dad. He explained every detail and made me understand in full what should be done. He was very insightful and is an expert in his field. Truly a professional and marvelous individual. I would highly recommend to all family and friends. I want to thank him for his time!!

— Roger D.

Very informative, like usual. Asset protection insight, difference in Trust structures, avoiding probate and making sure you pick the right people who will look after me while here and gone

— Cheryl R.

I contacted the law office of Bruno Reyes during the month of March 2021. Bruno and I spoke via phone regarding my issue, and he told me that he would look into my situation and would get back to me. Within a few days, I was contacted by his associate, Sabastian, regarding the problem at hand. Sabastian and I discussed the matter at hand, and informed me of my rights. During the consultation process, they both listened to me and were very patient. I had a positive experience and I highly recommend this law office.

— Ian B.

We had a lovely time consulting with Mr. Bruno and would recommend consulting with him regarding landlord tenant issues, as a tenant. He was knowledgeable and very helpful to us even though we did not ultimately contract with him.for services (on his advice).

— Lena G.

I called the law offices of Bruno Reyes to help me handle an estate case. The lawyer I spoke with was very informative on what steps my siblings and I have to take in order to receive benefits from my Late mother’s estate. I initially thought that I wouldn’t understand how to go about the process but, I was very pleased with the professionalism and knowledge displayed.

— Chaba D.

I was completely lost and desperate , not knowing how to solve a 15 years back and forth child support court battle. The judge wrongly lowered the amount ridiculously . Bruno Reyes law firm helped me not only to get the amount back on track but also get all the areas paid. They treat you as family and act like your problem is their own. You can feel their deep desire and determination to win your case putting up the research and investigation necessary .Thanks to this firm that weight of court battle being of my shoulders I was able to finally start my college courses majoring in computer science/web development. Thank you Bruno Reyes firm. God bless you all.

— Michael P.

These guys are the definition of professional. The office is very clean and welcoming. They are experts in their field. Sebastian is incredibly empathetic and very knowledgeable on all matters family law, divorce, real estate and trusts and estates. I highly recommend!

— Filip S.

Great attorney services at the Law Office of Bruno Reyes , very kind and professional people, helped me about my case, definitely would recommend this office to the other people who need this kind of services that is connected to any fields In Law, also I would like to mention that mr. Sebastian Karczmarczyk provided me great consultation over the phone, every time when that was needed, and it was helpful!

— Cindy C.

Thorough free consultation on elder law , he was precise and patient with questions. I left with a clear understanding and knowing my options.

— Amadeusz R.

Mr. Karczmarczyk helped my wife and I buy an apartment. He answered all our questions and made the whole transaction seem easy and stress free. He cared about us getting the apartment we’ve always wanted. Mr. Karczmarczyk was professional and knowledgeable. I would recommend him to anyone.

— Juan B.

Law Office of Bruno Reyes since day one was very determined to help me with the right legal solution to my long term problem unsolved for almost four years on my request to the Supreme Court of Queens County in order to have my Mother’s Guardianship. I have to thank you too, specially to Counselor Sebastian whom was working on my case with very concern.

— Steven M.

I was very impressed with the knowledge and insights of the attorney who helped me during a free consultation. He connected with me in a timely fashion as well.

— Patrick K.

Sebastian went above and beyond in supporting me dealing with legal matters at hand. Will absolutely recommend and work with the Law Office of Bruno Reyes again should there be a need.

— Moni B.

This Law office really helped me with my case regarding an abuse of power in a condo building in Corona Queens, the lawyer Sebastian called me at time, he answers all my questions , the free consultation was around 30 minutes, good quality of service.

— Ann W.

Very helpful and responsive to all of my questions and concerns. I am very grateful for his service every step of the way.

— Aranta C.

Provided very useful legal advice and direction with my uncontested divorce during a free consultation.

— Tomas G.

Great attention to detail. Went step by step with every issue I had and gave very precise explanation. Throughout the process gave 100% attention and very respectful. Highly Recommended.

— Djibrilla I.

This is the best Law Firm in NYC. Sebastian Kazmarick was so helpful and amazing. He provide me with useful and constructive informations.

— ANT C.

Very helpful and knowledgeable. They call you when they say they will. Great attorney and staff.

— Manny T.

Bruno tells it like it is. He is very knowledgable. Great lawyer.

— Jamel B.

This law office gave me some great advice and information. Thank you Frank.

— Dominique C.

Excellent phone consult i really appreciate this firm.

— Hong D.

Happy with the service and results!

— A Corner C.

The advice they gave helped a bit. Very informative.

— Elvin S.

Excellent service

★★★★★ 5/5

MICHAEL P

These guys are the definition of professional. The office is very clean and welcoming. They are experts in their field. Incredibly empathetic and very knowledgeable on all matters family law, divorce, real estate, and trusts and estates. I highly recommend!

MORE CLIENT REVIEWS
